bug.author: tamuhey
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
nlp = spacy.blank("en") docs_golds = [("", {})] nlp.evaluate(docs_golds) Causes the error: <denchmark-code> gold_deps = set() gold_deps_per_dep = {} gold_tags = set() > gold_ents = set(tags_to_entities([annot[-1] for annot in gold.orig_annot])) E TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
spacy/scorer.py:239: TypeError </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: osx Python Version Used: 3.7.4 spaCy Version Used: master Environment Information:
